alert.note: Alert for Northeast Bighorn Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 8:19PM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MST MONDAY THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 2 feet possible. * WHERE...In Montana, Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM MST Monday through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Recreation in the high country could be impacted by heavy accumulating snow. Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact travel over US Highway 14.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
